snippet: The author of this week's cover article in our Hollywood Issue answers questions about why "chick flicks" came about, the comedic genius of female actors and what's next for women in film.
abstract: The author of this week's cover article in our Hollywood Issue answers questions about why "chick flicks" came about, the comedic genius of female actors and what's next for women in film.

headline.main: Behind the Cover Story: A. O. Scott on Women, "Girls" and the Standout Female Performances of the Year
